diff_hunk:
@@ -328,6 +328,16 @@ def prelu(input, weight):
     return _functions.thnn.PReLU()(input, weight)
 
 
+def grufused(input_gate, hidden_gate, ibias, hbias, hx):
+    f = _functions.thnn.GRUFused()
+    return ibias and f(input_gate, hidden_gate, hx, ibias, hbias) or f(input_gate, hidden_gate, hx)
+
+
+def lstmfused(input_gate, hidden_gate, ibias, hbias, cx):
body: ugh I don't think we should be exposing fused and non-fused versions in any of the APIs, it's an implementation detail (especially that it's not supported on the CPU). I'd be ok with exposing the cells in here (you could just import them).
